plurals.name: tip_expiring_device_message
plurals.item: One of your devices will expire and get deactivated in **less than %1$d day**.\nYou may purchase an **Olvid+** subscription to keep it active.
One of your devices will expire and get deactivated in **less than %1$d days**.\nYou may purchase an **Olvid+** subscription to keep it active.

plurals.name: explanation_backup_v2_device_expiration_end
plurals.item: \" on this device, your previous device below will be deactivated:
\" on this device, your devices below will be deactivated:

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_discussions
plurals.item: Do you really want to delete the selected discussion and all the messages it contains?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete the %1$d selected discussions and all the messages they contain?\nThis action cannot be undone.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_discussions_choice
plurals.item: How do you want to delete the selected discussion and all the messages it contains?\nThis action cannot be undone.
How do you want to delete the %1$d selected discussions and all the messages they contain?\nThis action cannot be undone.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_messages
plurals.item: Do you really want to delete the selected message?\nThis action cannot be undone.
Do you really want to delete the %1$d selected messages?\nThis action cannot be undone.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_messages_choice
plurals.item: How do you want to delete the selected message?\nThis action cannot be undone.
How do you want to delete the %1$d selected messages?\nThis action cannot be undone.

plurals.name: dialog_warning_delete_messages_everywhere
plurals.item: You are about to **permanently** delete a message for **everyone** in this discussion. Please make sure this is indeed what you want to do.
You are about to **permanently** delete %1$d messages for **everyone** in this discussion. Please make sure this is indeed what you want to do.

plurals.name: dialog_warning_delete_discussions_everywhere
plurals.item: You are about to **permanently** delete a discussion and the messages it contains for **everyone** in this discussion. Please make sure this is indeed what you want to do.
You are about to **permanently** delete %1$d discussions and the messages they contain for **everyone** in these discussions. Please make sure this is indeed what you want to do.

plurals.name: dialog_message_invite_all_group_members
plurals.item: You are about to invite each group member with whom you have a channel (currently 1 member) to a private discussion.\nDo you want to proceed?
You are about to invite each group member with whom you have a channel (currently %1$d members) to a private discussion.\nDo you want to proceed?

plurals.name: explanation_invite_group_members
plurals.item: 1 group member can be invited to a private discussion
%1$d group members can be invited to a private discussion

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_user_impossible_end
plurals.item: . You will need to leave this group to proceed.
. You will need to leave these groups to proceed.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_user_with_pending_groups
plurals.item:
You are about to remove %1$s from your list of other users.

Note that %1$s was invited to %2$d group you belong to. They will get added back to this list if they join it. You may want to leave this group to avoid this.

Really delete this user?

You are about to remove %1$s from your list of other users.

Note that %1$s was invited to %2$d groups you belong to. They will get added back to this list if they join one of them. You may want to leave these groups to avoid this.

Really delete this user?

plurals.name: dialog_message_auto_join_pending_groups
plurals.item: Modifying this settings will automatically accept one pending group invitation.\nPress OK to confirm your choice and join this group.
Modifying this settings will automatically accept %1$d pending group invitations.\nPress OK to confirm your choice and join these groups.

plurals.name: dialog_message_save_selected_attachments
plurals.item: When prompted, please select the folder in which to save the selected attachment.\nNote that access to some folders may be restricted.
When prompted, please select the folder in which to save the %1$d selected attachments.\nNote that access to some folders may be restricted.

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_attachments
plurals.item: Do you really want to delete the selected attachment?
Do you really want to delete the %1$d selected attachments?

plurals.name: text_outgoing_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Group call with %2$s and one other

plurals.name: text_unanswered_outgoing_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Unanswered group call with %2$s and one other
Unanswered group call with %2$s and %1$d others

plurals.name: text_failed_outgoing_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Failed group call with %2$s and one other
Failed group call with %2$s and %1$d others

plurals.name: text_busy_outgoing_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Group call while %2$s and one other were busy
Group call while %2$s and %1$d others were busy

plurals.name: text_rejected_outgoing_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Rejected group call with %2$s and one other
Rejected group call with %2$s and %1$d others

plurals.name: text_incoming_group_call_with_contacts
plurals.item: Group call from %2$s and one other

plurals.name: dialog_message_invite_group_members
plurals.item: %3$s will be invited to join the group %2$s.
The %1$d following contacts will be invited to join the group %2$s: %3$s.

plurals.name: dialog_message_remove_group_members
plurals.item: %3$s will be removed from the group %2$s.
The %1$d following group members will be removed from %2$s: %3$s.

plurals.name: dialog_message_confirm_retention_policy
plurals.item: Applying the retention policy you just selected would delete a single message.\nAre you sur you want to proceed?
Applying the retention policy you just selected would delete %1$d messages.\nAre you sur you want to proceed?

plurals.name: text_keycloak_missing_search_result
plurals.item: … and one additional search result\nPlease refine your search
… and %1$d additional search results\nPlease refine your search

plurals.name: dialog_message_delete_remote_deleted_messages
plurals.item: You currently have 1 remote deleted message in your discussions. Do you want to delete it?
You currently have %1$d remote deleted messages in your discussions. Do you want to delete all such markers?

plurals.name: label_you_and_xxx_contacts_sharing_their_location
plurals.item: You and 1 other are sharing their location
You and %1$d others are sharing their location
